original: Ehrenborg, Sigurd Perrin, jägmästare, Opphem, f. 3/5/95 i Liverpool, Engl., av konsul Harald E. o. Anna Beatrice Wait. G. 35 m. Dagny Hilda Charlotta Sjöberg. Barn: Harald f. 36, Gösta 40, Ingrid 42, Bengt 45. ~ Stud:ex. v. Linköp. h. a. 1. 13, utex. fr. skogs’högsk. h. kurs 20. Res. t. USA, Västindien, Surinam, Japan o. Indien m. m. Anst. i domänv. 20-36, förvalt. av Åkers kronopark 34-36, do-mänförvalt. h. Riddarhuset sed. 36, äg. Opphem Storgård sed. 18. Rev. h. Östgöta hypoteksfören. sed. 33, i Tyllinge A-B sed. 28 o. i Tjärstad kommun sed. 44. RVO, div. skyttemed. o. -märken.
translated: Ehrenborg, Sigurd Perrin, forester, Opphem, born May 3rd, 1895 in Liverpool, England, son of consul Harald E. and Anna Beatrice Wait. Married in 1935 to Dagny Hilda Charlotta Sjöberg. Children: Harald born in 1936, Gösta in 1940, Ingrid in 1942, and Bengt in 1945. Completed secondary school in Linköping in 1913, graduated from forestry school in 1920. Traveled to the United States, the West Indies, Suriname, Japan, and India for work. Employed in state forestry from 1920-1936, managed the Åker kronopark from 1934-1936, and managed the forestry at Riddarhuset from 1936 onwards. Owner of Opphem Storgård since 1918. Chairman of Östgöta Mortgage Association from 1933, board member of Tyllinge A-B from 1928, and board member of Tjärstad municipality from 1944. Received the Royal Order of Vasa, various shooting medals and badges.
